casebody.data:
No. 824,

Misc.

Coppedge v. United States. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the District of Columbia Circuit denied. Bennett Boskey for petitioner. Solicitor General Cox, Assistant Attorney General Miller, Beatrice Rosenberg and Sidney M. Glazer for the United States.

Motion for leave to use the record in No. 157, October Term, 1961, granted.
